title: Talking about Troubles - author assumes audience

content.prompt: The author most likely assumes which of the following about his audience?

choices.label: It is interested in learning how to deal with personal problems.
It is overly concerned with keeping up appearances.
Its views are vehemently opposed to his own.
It is indifferent to the effect of its actions on others.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain how an argument demonstrates understanding of an audience's beliefs, values, or needs.
